mapper.select: select sum(case when `status` in (1,2,4,6,7,8) then 1 else 0 end ) as total_devices, sum(case when `status` =6 then 1 else 0 end ) as online_devices, sum(case when `status` in (1,7) then 1 else 0 end ) as offline_devices, sum(case when `status` in (2,8) then 1 else 0 end ) as problem_devices from ammeter_position

select sum(case when w11.warning_type = 1 then 1 else 0 end) warningOfflineDevices , sum(case when w11.warning_type = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as warningRsrqDevices , sum(case when w11.ammeter_id is null then 1 else 0 end) as normalDevices ,count(p.id) as totalDevices from ammeter_position p INNER JOIN ammeter_device d on d.imsi =p.imei LEFT JOIN (select w1.* from ammeter_warning w1,(select max(id) id from ammeter_warning w GROUP BY ammeter_id) w2 where w1.id = w2.id and w1.warning_status =0 ) w11 on w11.ammeter_id = d.id where p.status != 3

select IFNULL(sum(case when w.warning_status = 0 then 1 else 0 end ),0) currentWarnings, IFNULL(sum(case when w.warning_status = 1 then 1 else 0 end ),0) historyWarnings, count(w.id) as warningNumbers from ammeter_warning w INNER JOIN ammeter_device d on w.ammeter_id = d.id INNER JOIN ammeter_position p on d.imsi =p.imei where p.status !=3 and p.device_type =#{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and p.channel_id =#{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select sum(case when w11.warning_type = 1 then 1 else 0 end) warningOfflineDevices , sum(case when w11.warning_type = 0 and r.rule_params ='batteryStatus' then 1 else 0 end) as batteryWarningDevices ,sum(case when w11.warning_type = 0 and r.rule_params ='sensor' then 1 else 0 end) as sensorWarningDevices, sum(case when w11.warning_type = 0 and r.rule_params ='surfaceDistance' then 1 else 0 end) as surfaceDistanceWarningDevices, sum(case when w11.warning_type = 0 and r.rule_params ='tiltSensor' then 1 else 0 end) as tiltSensorWarningDevices, sum(case when w11.warning_type = 0 and r.rule_params ='waterLevelSensor' then 1 else 0 end) as waterLevelSensorWarningDevices, sum(case when w11.ammeter_id is null then 1 else 0 end) as normalDevices ,count(p.id) as totalDevices, sum(case when p.`status` = 6 then 1 else 0 end) as onlineDevices from ammeter_position p INNER JOIN ammeter_device d on d.imsi =p.imei LEFT JOIN (select w1.* from ammeter_warning w1,(select max(id) id from ammeter_warning w GROUP BY ammeter_id) w2 where w1.id = w2.id and w1.warning_status =0 ) w11 on w11.ammeter_id = d.id LEFT JOIN ammeter_rule r on w11.rule_id = r.id where p.status != 3 and p.device_type=0
and p.channel_id =#{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
